member.name: T:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeController
member.summary: Handles the fading effects. Original library: (https://gist.github.com/nathan-fiscaletti/3c0514862fe88b5664b10444e1098778)

member.name: M:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeController.#ctor(Krypton.Toolkit.KryptonForm)
member.summary: Construct the FadeController object with a form.

member.summary: Construct a FadeController object with a form and a parent form.

member.name: M:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeController.BeginFade
member.summary: Begin fading the form.

member.name: M:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeController.UpdateOpacity
member.summary: Update the opacity of the form using the timer.

member.name: M:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeController.ShowDialog(System.Single,Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeController.FadeCompleted)
member.summary: Fade the form in at the defined speed as a dialog based on parent form.

member.summary: Fade the form in at the defined speed.

member.name: M:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeController.FadeOut(System.Single,Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeController.FadeCompleted)
member.summary: Fade the form out at the defined speed.

member.name: M:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeController.ShowDialog(Krypton.Toolkit.KryptonForm,Krypton.Toolkit.KryptonForm,System.Single)
member.summary: Fades a dialog in using parent form and defined fade speed.

member.name: M:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeController.ShowDialog(Krypton.Toolkit.KryptonForm,Krypton.Toolkit.KryptonForm,System.Single,Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeController.FadeCompleted)
member.summary: Fades a dialog in using parent form and defined fade speed and call the finished delegate.)

member.name: M:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeController.FadeIn(Krypton.Toolkit.KryptonForm,System.Single,Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeController.FadeCompleted)

member.summary: Fade a form out at the defined speed.

member.summary: Fade a form in at the defined speed.

member.name: M:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeController.FadeOut(Krypton.Toolkit.KryptonForm,System.Single)
member.summary: Fade a form out at the defined speed.

member.name: M:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeController.FadeOutAndClose(Krypton.Toolkit.KryptonForm,System.Single)
member.summary: Fade a form out at the defined speed and close it when the fade has completed.

member.name: M:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeController.FadeOutAndClose(Krypton.Toolkit.KryptonForm,System.Single,Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeController.FadeCompleted)
member.summary: Fade a form out at the defined speed and close it when the fade has completed. After the form has closed, call the FadeComplete delegate.

member.summary: Fades the window in. Credit: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/12497826/better-algorithm-to-fade-a-winform.

member.summary: Fades the window out. Credit: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/12497826/better-algorithm-to-fade-a-winform.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeSpeedChoice
member.summary: Chooses the fading speed of a

member.name: F:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeSpeedChoice.Slowest
member.summary: Use the slowest fade speed possible. This is tied to the corresponding float value in , which is 1.

member.name: F:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeSpeedChoice.Slower
member.summary: Use the second slowest fade speed possible. This is tied to the corresponding float value in , which is 10.

member.name: F:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeSpeedChoice.Slow
member.summary: Use the third slowest fade speed possible. This is tied to the corresponding float value in , which is 25.

member.name: F:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeSpeedChoice.Normal
member.summary: Use a normal fade speed. This is tied to the corresponding float value in , which is 50.

member.name: F:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeSpeedChoice.Fast
member.summary: Use a fast fading speed. This is tied to the corresponding float value in , which is 60.

member.name: F:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeSpeedChoice.Faster
member.summary: Use a slightly faster fading speed. This is tied to the corresponding float value in , which is 75.

member.name: F:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeSpeedChoice.Fastest
member.summary: Use the fastest fading speed possible. This is tied to the corresponding float value in , which is 100.

member.name: F:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Effects.FadeSpeedChoice.Custom
member.summary: Define your own fading speed.
